org.youscope.uielements

Class FocusField

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.youscope.uielements.DynamicPanel
              • org.youscope.uielements.FocusField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class FocusField
extends DynamicPanel
    UI element to select a focus device and focus adjustment delay.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
